CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 18, 1949, pg. 11 reads: "Newlyweds - The Rev. A.L. Pierce, presiding elder of the Pittsburgh District of the Allegheny Conference of the AME Zion Church, was happily joined in wedlock to Mrs. Cora Eaton of New York City, Friday, June 10. The former Mrs. Eaton was a prominent member of the Mother AME Zion Church, New York City.  The ceremony was performed by Dr. B.C. Robeson, pastor of Mother Zion Church.  The Rev. and Mrs. Pierce will take up residence in Pittsburgh. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Cora Eaton Pierce and Rev. A. L. Pierce, posed on wooden bench in Harris Studio, in front of light colored background
